content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, you received a command from me to browse Good Housekeeping for scavenger hunt ideas for kids. You successfully found a list of 20 creative ideas that can be adapted to different situations and interests and can be tailored to the skill level of the children. The article suggests starting with the location and figuring out appropriate themes, such as colors or seasonal items. You also found links to the search page, the article, subscription, my articles, and GH+ member portal. I instructed you to write the URL of the website to a file named "scavenger_hunt_links.txt", which you completed successfully.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "scavenger_hunt_ideas.txt", "text": "20 creative scavenger hunt ideas for kids:\\n1. Indoor scavenger hunt\\n2. Outdoor scavenger hunt\\n3. Nature scavenger hunt\\n4. Art scavenger hunt\\n5. Reading scavenger hunt\\n6. Shape-themed scavenger hunt\\n7. Color-themed scavenger hunt\\n8. Alphabet scavenger hunt\\n9. Number scavenger hunt\\n10. Texture scavenger hunt\\n11. Sound scavenger hunt\\n12. Smell scavenger hunt\\n13. Taste scavenger hunt\\n14. Seasonal scavenger hunt\\n15. Holiday scavenger hunt\\n16. Animal scavenger hunt\\n17. Science scavenger hunt\\n18. History scavenger hunt\\n19. Geography scavenger hunt\\n20. Treasure hunt"}}}'}]
"""
